name: Hi-Jump
description:
DESCRIPTION

Hi-Jump is a 2D platformer game where the objective is to jump up as high as you can. a simple and straightforward game, but can be difficult if you're not careful enough. How high you've jumped will be showed inside the game, but it won't keep your best record

LIBRARY USED

- Pygame: import pygame (Python ver. 3.9.2)

- System: import sys

- Randomizer: import random

- Mixer: Doesn't stated in the library but used in the codes

INSTRUCTION: DOWNLOADING THE GAME

- Before you can run the game,  you need at least have Python ver. 3.9.2, pygames, and mixer inside you computer before you can download the game

- Download the file

- Extract the file

- Open the file and select the Hi-Jump Python file by double-clicking it

- Enjoy

INSTRUCTION: PLAYING THE GAME

SPACE to jump ,HOLD SPACE to jump higher, LEFT and RIGHT ARROWS to move side to side,  be quick becasue the starter platform will move too.
